item.title: RIO = Rivers Influencing the Ocean
item.description:
Assessing the glacier projection uncertainties in the Southern Andes (40-56Â°S) from a catchment perspective

The RIO (river in English) project seeks to improve understanding of the environment and encourage reasoned decision-making with critical and reflective thinking. Chilean society, although it values rivers and coastal systems, still has a strong lack of knowledge about the virtuous connections that are generated between them. Follow us in Instagram (spanish content).
